verbs.description: One bargaining chip Kim Jong Un [V: may] bring to the negotiating table for his summit meeting with President Trump on Tuesday is an offer to open a Western hamburger franchise in Pyongyang . However , it would n’t be the first fast - food joint there . Patrick Soh introduced the burger there in 2009 .

[ARG1: One bargaining chip] [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: bring] [ARG2: to the negotiating table] [ARGM-PRP: for his summit meeting with President Trump on Tuesday] is an offer to open a Western hamburger franchise in Pyongyang . However , it would n’t be the first fast - food joint there . Patrick Soh introduced the burger there in 2009 .
